alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL AITKIN AND EASTERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CDT... At 1044 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garrison, or 11 miles west of Mille Lacs Lake, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ironton around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Crosby, Deerwood, Aitkin and Cuyuna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
